settings.heading: How do I place an order?
settings.row_content: Please review our guide to placing an order.

settings.heading: What color do I wear?
settings.row_content: Centura operates using a color by discipline program to increase patient satisfaction. Please click here to see what color your department uses.

settings.heading: What logo should I select for embroidery?
settings.row_content: We will handle that! As long as you login using your Centura email address, and shop under your clinic & department collection, the correct logo will be added to your order. Keep in mind that some locations & departments may not require embroidery on their uniforms.

settings.heading: Can I redeem my voucher in-store?
settings.row_content:
Yes, just head into either one of the Crazy Scrubs locations and our store associates will help you out. Just make sure to have your ID and Centura email address.

GLENDALE

760 S Colorado Blvd #G

Glendale, CO 80246

LITTLETON

151 W Mineral Ave #106

Littleton, CO 80120

settings.heading: Can I save part of my voucher for future use?
settings.row_content: Per Centura requirements, vouchers are only good for a one-time use; you should use your voucher to the full amount if possible.

settings.heading: Can I buy online and pick-up in store?
settings.row_content: Unfortunately, no, that option is not available at this time.

settings.heading: How can I return my product?
settings.row_content:
You have two options: Online and In-store returns.

Online: Both online and in-store orders can be returned using our online portal. For more details on the returns process and our return policy, please click here.

In-store: Both online and in-store orders can be returned at either Crazy Scrubs location. Just show up with your ID, Order Number, and Centura Email, and our store associates will help you out.

GLENDALE

760 S Colorado Blvd #G

Glendale, CO 80246

LITTLETON

151 W Mineral Ave #106

Littleton, CO 80120

settings.heading: What size do I wear?
settings.row_content:
Centura Health has chosen a variety of scrub brands to allow you to select the product with the fit and function you need.

To help you you choose the correct size, you will see a brand size chart on each product page in the product images. In addition, this size comparision guide will show you the Lifethreads product sizing and then a comparison to the brands.

Locate your usual street clothes size in the LifeThreads chart, then you can compare how other brands will fit in the charts below.

As always, feel free to reach out to our team at help@topstitchscrubs.com and they will be happy to make recommendations.

settings.heading: How do LifeThreads products eliminate harmful pathogens and bacteria?
settings.row_content: LifeThreads products are treated with an EPA-registered, antimicrobial additive that is embedded into the textile during the manufacturing phase. It protects the treated fabric by blocking the ability of bacteria to reproduce and absorb nutrients.

settings.heading: Are LifeThreads products safe to wear?
settings.row_content: All garments produced by LifeThreads use EPA-registered additives and are completely safe for all users. Our products adhere strictly to the OEKO-TEX® standard.

settings.heading: Do LifeThreads scrubs require any special handling or treatment?
settings.row_content: No, our products don't require any special handling or treatment to use. All LifeThreads scrubs and apparel can be washed at home, or industrially laundered using the same methods as conventional scrubs.

settings.heading: How should I care for my LifeThreads products?
settings.row_content: Normal washing, normal drying- no special treatment necessary. LifeThreads products may be laundered in a residential or commercial setting.
